mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MDT_CTABLENAME AS name, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_TABLE_DESC('01',MDT_CTABLENAME,'ja') AS description, MDT_NTABLESEQ AS sort FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY,MAST_DATADICTBL WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND MD_CAVLFORCKSTART = '1' AND MD_CCUSTOMERID = MDT_CCUSTOMERID AND MD_CTABLENAME = MDT_CTABLENAME ORDER BY MDT_NTABLESEQ,MDT_CTABLENAME
